page.description: Save the document to a memory image of an Excel 2003 (.xls) file.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.t.]* if the operation succeeds. Otherwise, returns *[xb:.f.]*. The Office::Excel2003Document CallResult object will contain additional information if the operation fails.

page.note: The Office::Excel2003Document class is for working with Excel 2003 (.xls) files. For Excel 2007 (.xlsx) files, use [Office::ExcelDocument].
